short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A friendly time reminder that helps you stay aware of time passing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This friendly Chrome extension, Gentle Time Reminder, is designed to help you stay aware of time passing without overwhelming you. It provides gentle, customizable reminders for breaks, tasks, or any time-sensitive activities. With an easy-to-use interface, you can quickly set snooze intervals, receive notifications, and track the time remaining before your next reminder. Whether you're working, studying, or just managing your daily schedule, Gentle Time Reminder ensures you stay on track while maintaining a smooth and calm workflow. The extension also supports sound notifications and offers personalized settings for a tailored experience. Its simple design and user-friendly features make it the perfect tool for anyone looking to stay organized and efficient.
